result.title: K-th Largest Element Range in a range with point update
result.content:
Hello,

I am stuck with a problem for a few days or I can say,month. That problem uses the idea of finding the K-th Largest Element in a range along with point update operation.

I solved a similar problem ( MKTHNUM â€” K-th Number ) without point update. But couldn't come up with any idea for update operations.

Any kind of help is appreciated.
